transcript: You whispered the sweetest, most intimate thanks to me right into my ear. So I could feel them as much as hear them. And I remember thinking, this is it. You know, finally, I'm as happy as I'm supposed to be.

So I could feel them as much as hear them.
And I remember thinking, this is it.
You know, finally, I'm as happy as I'm supposed to be.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: You whispered the sweetest, most intimate things to me right into my ear so I could feel them as much as hear them.  And I remember thinking, this is it.  You know, finally, I am as happy as I'm supposed to be.
